## Player.on() method

Adds a listener to a player event

**Signature:**

```typescript
on<E extends PlayerEvent>(event: E, handler: PlayerEventHandler<E>): void;
```

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description

</td></tr>
<tr><td>

</td><td>

[PlayerEventHandler](./player.playereventhandler.md)<!-- -->&lt;E&gt;


</td><td>

a callback function to handle the event


</td></tr>

void
